Intro: ^Good thing you're here! The last one was awful.
^As you may know, in this neighborhood, cake is VERY important.
^So that makes us also VERY important.
^Heh. We're about to become EVEN more important.
^Hey! Emo Duck! Close your beak! We're here to talk about delivery.
^Since cake is SO important, we have lots of top-secret cake business. Can we trust you to keep it zipped?

c-0: ^Therefore, this first delivery is not a test. Can you send this Ingredient Package to the Toad Gang?
^It's good pay! Just don't ask why we aren't doing it ourselves.
^I'm sure you've heard of Toad's reputation. So, please, show us you can be delicate around him?
^We won't wish you luck, because it won't help you!
^Remember, your mission is to deliver ingredients to Toad Gang. Nothing else.
^Don't let them rope you into any other tasks. They can be nefarious.
